issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Messages printed in console and console err (mostly mapred/tez logs) etc should be available to the clients using hive server 2 as well.

This property seem to solve it to some extent (hive.server2.logging.operation.enabled) but its not complete. 

Wherever logs are happening, we need to tee it to the operation logs as well so that the clients can discover them.

 

Proposed solution is to use a tee stream to tee it to both op logs and console logs.
fields.summary: Console info/error messages should be accessible by clients using hive server as well
